name: RN apps: Recent statuses
precondition:
• Logged in on the mobile app
  • Custom statuses enabled on the server

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
1. Open the "Set a status" modal
  2. Tap the "Set a status" text field, enter a status text and select an emoji
  3. Tap "Done"
inline.expectedResult:
• "Set a status" modal is dismissed
  • Custom status is successfully set

inline.description:
1. Clear the status
  2. Tap "Set a status" top open the modal
inline.expectedResult: Status set in step 1 is shown on the top in the "Recent" section

inline.description: Click the "x" button next to the recent status
inline.expectedResult: Status set in step 1 is completely removed from the list

inline.description:
1. Select a default status from the Suggestions list
  2. Tap "Done"
inline.expectedResult:
• "Set a status" modal is dismissed
  • Custom status is successfully set

inline.description:
1. Clear the status
  2. Tap "Set a status" top open the modal
inline.expectedResult: Status set in step 4 is shown on the top in the "Recent" section

inline.description: Click the "x" button next to the recent status
inline.expectedResult: Status set in step 4 is moved from the Recent list to the Suggested list
